Translations.Text: vettebe`u ma tetlu-sseyatinu `ala mulki suleyman. vema kefera suleymanu velakinne-sseyatine keferu yu`allimune-nnase-ssihr. vema unzile `ale-lmelekeyni bibabile harute vemarut. vema yu`allimani min ehadin hatta yekula innema nahnu fitnetun fela tekfur. feyete`allemune minhuma ma yuferrikune bihi beyne-lmer'i vezevcih. vema hum bidarrine bihi min ehadin illa biizni-llah. veyete`allemune ma yedurruhum vela yenfe`uhum. velekad `alimu lemeni-sterahu ma lehu fi-l'ahirati min halak. velebi'se ma serav bihi enfusehum. lev kanu ya`lemun
velev ennehum amenu vettekav lemesubetum min `indi-llahi hayr. lev kanu ya`lemun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu la tekulu ra`ina vekulu-nzurna vesme`u. velilkafirine `azabun elim
ma yeveddu-llezine keferu min ehli-lkitabi vele-lmusrikine ey yunezzele `aleykum min hayrim mir rabbikum. vellahu yahtessu birahmetihi mey yesa'. vellahu zu-lfadli-l`azim
